## 类型 / Type

<!-- 请选择一项 / Please select one -->

- [ ] feat: 功能 / Feature
- [ ] fix: 修复 / Bug Fix
- [ ] docs: 文档 / Documentation
- [ ] style: 格式 / Code Style
- [ ] refactor: 重构 / Refactoring
- [ ] perf: 性能 / Performance
- [ ] test: 测试 / Tests
- [ ] chore: 构建 / Chores

## 检查清单 / Checklist

- [ ] 我已阅读贡献指南 / I have read the contribution guidelines
- [ ] 我的提交符合双语规范 / My commits follow bilingual conventions
- [ ] 代码已本地测试 / Code tested locally
- [ ] 文档已更新 / Documentation updated
